ComicInfo.Title: Dr. Atomic Explores the Universe!; Dr. Atomic and His Spaceship; Dr. Atomic Invents the Iron Pig; Let A Smile Be Your Umbrella; The Great Bank Robber; A Horny Old Geezer is He; Divine Comedy; Dr. Atomic Meets the Space Brothers; Dr. Atomic Does It Again!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 20:41:42. [CVDB335748] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:12:29. [Issue ID 277725]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dr. Atomic Explores the Universe!: Dr. Atomic investigates a black hole.
Dr. Atomic and His Spaceship: Dr. Atomic tries to build a spaceship but his hippie neighbor blows it up.
Dr. Atomic Invents the Iron Pig: Dr. Atomic builds a robot to protect mankind.
Let A Smile Be Your Umbrella: Dr. Atomic's robot doesn't follow orders very well.
The Great Bank Robber: Dr. Atomic is mistaken for a bank robber.
A Horny Old Geezer is He: Dr. Atomic picks up a hitchhiker.
Divine Comedy: Dr. Atomic asks his computer if there is a God.
Dr. Atomic Meets the Space Brothers: Dr. Atomic and his friend go to see the UFO's.
Dr. Atomic Does It Again!: Dr. Atomic's robot is mugged.
